name: First Class Bleu Cheese Salad
author: GRAYJETMAN
summary: We used to serve this salad in First Class (when service was still first class). Nearly everyone who had this salad commented on how good it was. This salad is best if served very cold and not made too far in advance of serving. Some very finely chopped onion adds to this salad also, but not on an airplane.
ingredients: 1  hard-cooked egg, sieved or finely chopped
8  romaine lettuce leaves, torn into bite size pieces
directions: In a medium bowl, toss together the egg, romaine lettuce, blue cheese dressing, toasted almonds, and crumbled blue cheese
